title: Benefits of assembling a diverse team

content.question: A company that develops educational software wants to assemble a collaborative team of developers from a variety of professional and cultural backgrounds. Which of the following is NOT considered a benefit of assembling such a team?

choices.label: Collaboration that includes diverse backgrounds and perspectives can eliminate the need for software testing.
Collaboration that includes diverse backgrounds and perspectives can help the team anticipate the needs of a variety of software users.
Collaboration that includes diverse backgrounds and perspectives can help the team avoid bias.
Collaboration that includes diverse backgrounds and perspectives can reflect the strengths of the individual team members.

content.answer: Collaboration that includes diverse backgrounds and perspectives can eliminate the need for software testing.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how collaboration affects the development of a solution.
